resources.string: Messages from actions will go here.
Show average price of all dive watches
Show the number of automatic watches
Show all watches of a given brand

Load a List from off the Web

Enter a URL in the box.
Then press the button.

Add a Watch

Enter a file name.
Then press the button to add the watch.

Display Watch Details

Enter a serial number.
Then press the button to see watch details.

Remove a Watch

Enter a serial number from one of the watches in the list into the box.
Then press the button to remove the watch.

Display Watches of the Same Brand

Enter a watch brand name.
Then press the button to see information about all the watches with the same brand name.
